blocks.contentBasic__content:
# Build a custom page builder hand-in-hand with your design system

By leveraging the power of Gatsby combined with the elegance of [TinaCMS](https://tina.ia), the **Rockin' Blocks** workspace allows teams to start working in an elegant sandbox without wasting a bunch of time getting configured.

## Easy to edit & understand

The **Rockin' Blocks** workspace brings [Gatsby](https://gatsbyjs.com) and [TinaCMS](https://tina.io) together to provide a robust CMS experience on top of a simple GraphQL interface with basic JSON and Markdown files. The end result is a development experience that is easy for both developers and marketing teams to contribute and share the burden of getting a product to market.

## Enjoy the benefits of version control

**Rockin' Blocks** reads changes to files on your filesystem and monitors those changes with Git. This means non-developers can make changes through the CMS and still enjoy all the benefits of version control: branching, pull requests, etc.

## Transition from WordPress or Drupal

**Rockin' Blocks** is a great starting point for teams that are familiar with building and maintaining sites in older CMS frameworks like WordPress and Drupal. If you're familiar in developing with plugins like [Advanced Custom Fields](), you'll have no problem getting started with **Rockin' Blocks**.
